review: Works well, but interface takes getting used to compared to Apple TV. The latter is more intuitive and easier to navigate. That said, still very good product.
author: Neal Pratt

review: I love the fire stick, my only issue is that i paid extra money to have by a certain date, an it took 3 extra days to be delivered. I would not have paid the extra money if i knew it was still going to take so long to deliver. But the firs stick itself exceeds all my expectations.
author: Aaron c Doty

review: Got it just as an easy way to get Netflix integrated into my system, but it does so much more. Plus its portable and Dual-Band complaint!MyHarmony universal remotes needs to get the IR codes for better integration. but that does not count against the Fire Stick, that's the universal remote guys.
author: Eli A

review: Great piece  of tech it has all the things I need to include caption since i am almost deaf
author: Edwin C. Hill
